sentences: On the basis for higher projections of global mean sea level rise in the 21st century, Germany queried why an upper boundary 'of what is physically possible' has not been indicated, to which the CLAs responded that there was no scientific basis for providing this information since there were no probability levels available.
enb_long_title: Twelfth Session of Working Group I (WGI) of the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC) and Thirty-sixth Session of the IPCC
